server

Class StaticFileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.StaticFileHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler

    public class StaticFileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    This class is used to serve static files as html, javascript, css These files are stored in the directory designated by filesystemRoot.
    Author:
    Alexandre Colicchio, Andy Chabalier, Philippe Letaif, Thibaud Gasser

      • StaticFileHandler

        public StaticFileHandler(java.lang.String filesystemRoot)
        Constructor for a StaticFileHandler. Only files under filesystemRoot directory will be served to the client.
        Parameters:
        filesystemRoot - The root directory in the filesystem.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange httpExchange)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Manage request. Support only GET request. Send the file on the response stream contains in the httpExchange input argument.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
        Parameters:
        httpExchange - the exchange containing the request from the client and used to send the response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error on copyStream
        See Also:
